chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to go?
Bueno, podemos comenzar
alright
i see a twig to my left leading to a small island with a tiger. where to from here, mate?
you should walk straight across the path in front of you which leads to the tiger
okay, i'm now on the tiger's island. there's another small island at the southeast, with a butterfly on it
also, there's a big one southwest with a parrot in a tree. where should i head next?
head in the direction of the parrot, around the rock
i'm at parrot's island now. i see 3 rocks to the southeast leading to an island with a frog
there's also an elephant on my left. so, where to?
walk north of the parrot, then go down between the parrot and the elephant. Fromthere, cross the rocks towards the frog islandcks
gotcha
now i'm on the frog's island. there's a crocodile to the left
Go down past the frog, then loop back and walk across the crock onto the island with the elephant again
ookay, i'm back with the elephant now
there's a giraffe west and a snake southeast. where next?
Head to the giraffe island
alright, i'm hanging out with the giraffe now
now what?
cross the branch to the snake
cool, i'm at snake island now
i see a treasure 2 steps east. is that where i'm heading?
yes, walk directly to the treasure and you're there!
awesome! i'm at the treasure now
*finished* we did it! great team work!
hey!!! ya comenzamos?
Vamonos!
perfecto! bueno, ve hacia la izquierda, pasando por debajo de un banco de madera y cruzando un sendero hasta ver un florista
ahora no te acerques al florista todavía, dale la vuelta
bueno, y ahora?
ahora, cruza nuevamente ese sendero y regresa al punto de inicio
te encontrarás al canino blanco de nuevo
ok
sigamos! cruza ese tronquito hacia el sur
ok, estoy alli
perfecto
ahora ve hacia el sur un poco más, encontrarás otro perrito blanco cerca de un mantel de picnic a cuadros
llegue
genial! ahora atraviesa ese tapete y sigue caminando hacia la izquierda junto a un tazón de bayas
ya estoy
excelente! ahora, busca una rama que cruce el río hacia el norte y camina por allí
y ahora?
vas muy bien
ahora solo gira alrededor del arbusto verde sin tocarlo, por la derecha, hasta que llegues al florista
ok
bueno, ahora gira a la izquierda y cruza debajo del puesto del florista
ya
genial! verás un gran puente con dos personas en bicicleta, solo sigue hacia el oeste pasándolo
esta hecho
genial!
y ahora? Que hacemos?
verás a dos personas mayores en un banco leyendo periódicos justo después del puente
da un pequeño paseo hacia el sur, entre esas personas y une rama de madera
he hecho
eres genial en esto! cerca de la punta de esa rama encontrarás un arbusto verde, córrete hacia allí
ok
ahora, coge dirección este, entre la rama y el arbusto
ok
fantástico! ahora sigue por allí y adelante encontrarás una sorpresa
¡te la dejo a ti descubrir!
he llegado!
¡perfecto! eres un gran navegante
¿te encontraste con el joven ciervo marrón?
no, donde esta?
sigue hacia el este unos pasos más, ¡lo verás! es marrón y joven!
hey, q tal? empezamos el juego?
Vamonos! Quieres que describo en ingles o espanol?
como prefieras, estoy listo para empezar
estoy en la tienda al norte del mapa, ¿por dónde vamos?
va al sur, cerca al perrito
aquí estoy, junto al perrito sentado al lado del fuego
¿y ahora qué?
go a little southeast towards the grill
there's no grill here, mate
just a fire, a red mushroom to the right of it, and a blue car further south. which way now?
towards the fire, following the path
all right, i've passed the fire and am near the mushroom
should i keep going south towards the car?
va al sureste, cerca del carro
perfecto, estoy al lado del carro azul
y ahora un poquito al oeste, para seguir el path
hecho, estoy viendo el telescopio azul hacia el sur y las rocas hacia el oeste
bueno
¿me dirijo a las rocas o sigo hacia el telescopio?
walk towards the telescope
okay, i'm at the telescope now
what's next?
walk around the bush and go south
i'm now south of the telescope, and the wooden house surrounded by rocks is in view to the west
should i head there?
si!
awesome! estoy en la casa
*finished* what a fun game! ¿otra ronda?
hola, q tal? ready to play?
Let's go!
awesome! start by heading towards the southwest, right under the first palm tree. make a right turn at the second one and a quick left turn just before the third one
from there, head straight south. can you see it?
yes, and now?
great! scoot a bit to the left where you see the brown puppy
turn left and then take another right turn to the south, it should be a smooth curve. got it?
ok
sweet! you should see a big rock to your left and a small one to your right
the plan is to slide right between them. after that, it's time to hit the waves! how are things looking from your end?
perfecto!
perfect! now, you'll see a big red crab in the water, creepy isn't it? anyway, time to steer right, keep following the big rock, and head west
ok
keep going till you pass a medium-sized rock
that's when you'll spot a shark - don't be scared, though! you just need to turn sharp right. rolled your eyes, huh?
and now
now, back to land! squeeze between the medium rock and that colourful beach ball, and move north
basically, a bit left
ok
good job! keep walking until you spot a red tent and speaker setup
stick to the middle of those two landmarks and head towards the northwest
ok
cool! trace a curve around the red tent, like you're drawing a half-moon around it
ok
great! head south now but stop just before you hit the sea again
do you see a red kayak? steer right and move along it, heading west
